description: When you rock this super comfy polyester cotton blend sweatshirt, you're rocking a piece of Marmot's 50 year history. A tagline that's been with us since the very beginning, "Marmot For Life" embodies our commitment to keeping you comfortable for the longhaul. This crewneck is no exception. Sideline or mountainside, skate park to state park, this sweatshirt is ready for low key or high octane adventure. It's the sweatshirt that's never more than an arm's length away, from the crag, to the couch, to the trunk of your car, and it's the last layer you take off, if you take it off at all, before you hit the hay or the side zips on the sleeping bag
name: Marmot Marmot For Life Crew Sweatshirt - Mens
